title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 261.12 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 261.12 - Applicability

State Regulations

The requirements of this Part are applicable only
to: (a) small businesses, until

September 18, 2017; and
(b) very
small businesses and qualified facilities, until September 18, 2018. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
261.12

Adopted

New

York State Register June 21, 2017 /Volume XXXIX, Issue 25, eff. 6/21/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
